v1.3.0 - Changelog
- Enabled proper support for tablets of minimum width 1600 pixels (like the Galaxy Tab S7 with its 2650x1600 resolution). - Added a new setting to determine which days the bot will do Extra Races via modulo. - Added a new setting to stop the bot when a Mandatory Race is detected. - Overhauled segmented Notification system to be centralized into one. - Minor change to Notification title. - Minor improvements to overall performance. - Added support for the new Characters: Special Week (Summer) and Maruzensky (Summer). - Added support for the new Support Card: SSR Speed Sweep Tosho and SSR Stamina Winning Ticket.
